dcterms:description: VisDial v0.9 contains 83k and 40k dialogs on COCO-train and COCO-val images respectively, totaling 1.2M QA pairs. Each dialog consists of 10-round QA pairs for each image.
dcterms:title: VisDial v0.9

dcterms:description: VisDial v1.0 is an extension of VisDial v0.9, adding additional 10k dialogs on Flickr images. The new train, validation, and test splits contain 123k, 2k, and 8k dialogs respectively.
dcterms:title: VisDial v1.0

dcterms:description: COCO dataset is used in VisDial v0.9, containing images with common objects in context.
